title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Historic Sites   30 Photos  You are about to travel 2,500 miles, from Mission San Juan Bautista Guerrero, Mexico to Fort St. Jean Baptiste Nachitoches Parish, Natchitoches, Louisiana—all along El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail—experiencing the trail through 30 selected historic sites. Your journey starts in Mexico, travels across Texas, and ends in northwest Louisiana.
